input.sentences: the funeral for the fallen officer was very somber .
his casket was carried out from the church by his co-workers .
they were all in uniform trying not to cry .
the whole police force was present to honor them .
the priest was thanked by everyone for his final farewell .
output.sentences: The scenery is somber as the lone police officer stands guard.
The funeral has begun with the bagpipe player leading the way for the casket carriers.
The procession carries on as families and friends say their last goodbyes with tears in their eyes.
The other officers stand at attention in honor of their fallen comrade.
As the procession comes to a close, the priest gives thanks to all those who came to attend.
